## createVersion() function

> Warning: This API is now obsolete.
> 
> 

Constructs a version object from a version string and a build date

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function createVersion(aVersionString: string, aBuildDate: string): WchSdkVersion;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  aVersionString | <code>string</code> | the version string such as in package json |
|  aBuildDate | <code>string</code> | the build date in ISO format |

<b>Returns:</b>

`WchSdkVersion`

the SDK version object
